products.name: MacBook Pro M2 MNEJ3 2022 LLA 13.3 inch
products.description: The MacBook Pro M2 MNEJ3 2022 model comes with the powerful Apple M2 chip, 8GB of RAM, and 256GB of storage, offering exceptional performance and a stunning 13.3-inch Retina display.
products.battery_life: Up to 20 hours of video playback

products.name: Inateck 12.3 - 13 inch MacBook Case Sleeve
products.description: The Inateck MacBook case sleeve is made of high-quality neoprene material that provides protection against dust, scratches, and minor impacts for your 12.3 - 13 inch MacBook.

products.name: Laptop Privacy Screen for 13 Macbook
products.description: This privacy screen for 13 inch MacBook Pro and MacBook Air provides excellent privacy protection by limiting the viewing angle, ensuring that others cannot see your screen from the side.

products.name: Apple Magic Mouse
products.description: The Apple Magic Mouse features a sleek, minimalistic design with multi-touch capabilities, providing smooth, precise control for your MacBook or desktop. It connects wirelessly via Bluetooth and offers long-lasting battery life.
products.battery_life: Up to 1 month of battery life

products.name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
products.description: The iPhone 15 Pro Max comes with a 6.7-inch display, A17 Pro chip, and a high-quality camera system. It delivers exceptional performance, long battery life, and powerful processing capabilities.
products.battery_life: Up to 29 hours of video playback

products.name: Canon EOS R5 Camera
products.description: The Canon EOS R5 is a mirrorless camera with a 45MP full-frame sensor, offering high-speed performance, 8K video recording, and advanced autofocus capabilities, ideal for professional photographers and videographers.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 is a smartwatch that offers a 1.4-inch AMOLED display, health monitoring features, and a sleek design, making it an excellent choice for fitness enthusiasts and everyday use.
